name: Freefallin'
description:
Why would you only fall down when you can fall in other directions too?

Each level is 200 points long, and at the end of each level you gain an extra life. Avoid the mid-air debris and fly fall as far as you can.

Payment is not required but is greatly appreciated.

Controls:

When falling vertically:

A or [Left Arrow]: Move left

D or [Right Arrow]: Move right

When falling horizontally:

W or [Up Arrow]: Move up

S or [Down Arrow]: Move down
